sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const About = () => { return (

About

I am UI Designer/Developer with over 10 years experience in a fast paced digital agency environment. I love to solve problems, whether it be through clever design or clean code. Bringing creative ideas and solid design to life is what makes me tick.

Originally trained in Visual Communications, I've since upskilled and now work as a web developer and digital designer. In my current role I manage my own smaller scale projects and client base, as well as part of a team on larger projects.

I'm currently working through an online full stack development course.

When I'm not coding or upskilling I like to break away from the screen completely and make my own fun - literally! I love working on my little garden, learning about plants and landscaping as I go. On rainy days, I always have a knitting or crochet project on the go, and the sewing machine comes out from time to time as well.

) } export default About
